data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 23017, Version Hash: ff85ea5ba61f12b4cac137b048a25ed0dd5648de
data.actual_result: The cursor icon/display, does not change in a small but noticeable window in between the two.
data.expected_result: The cursor icon/display is supposed to change from the pointer/default to the hand.
data.short_description: Cursor hover icon/display does not change in another's profile in between Send Request/Message and Three Dots.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open anyone's profile besides you - Place your cursor on top of "Send Friend Request" (if non-friend's profile) or "Send Message" (if friend's profile) - Observe cursor icon change from pointer/default to hand - Place your cursor on top of the Three Vertical Dots which opens the option menu (block, message) - Observe cursor icon change from the pointer/default to hand - Place your cursor in between "Send Friend Request" or "Send Message" and the three dots option menu - Observe for any changes in your cursor's icon when hovering - Click to open the three vertical dots option menu
